Configuration.Description: Expanded replication set based on Nalls et al. 2014.
Configuration.StudyInEx: Included samples are unrelated cases and controls of European ancestry with high quality genotype data and proper consent. For further details see PMID: 21292315, PMID: 21738488, PMID: 25444595, and PMID: 25064009.
